portfolios.name: 3D Portfolio Website
portfolios.description: An immersive 3D portfolio website built with React and Three.js, featuring interactive 3D models, smooth animations, and responsive design. Showcases projects and skills in a visually stunning way.
portfolios.detailedDescription: This project represents a cutting-edge approach to portfolio presentation, combining modern web technologies with 3D graphics to create an engaging user experience. The website features interactive 3D models, smooth animations, and a responsive design that works seamlessly across all devices. Built with React, Three.js, and TypeScript, it demonstrates advanced frontend development skills and creative problem-solving abilities.
portfolios.shortDescription: Immersive 3D portfolio with interactive models and animations
challenges: Creating smooth animations across different devices
solutions: Used LOD (Level of Detail) techniques for 3D models
Created adaptive 3D rendering based on device capabilities

portfolios.name: E-Commerce Platform
portfolios.description: A full-stack e-commerce solution with 3D product visualization, real-time inventory management, and secure payment processing. Built with React, Node.js, and MongoDB.
portfolios.detailedDescription: This comprehensive e-commerce platform revolutionizes online shopping with 3D product visualization capabilities. The platform includes a complete admin dashboard, real-time inventory management, secure payment processing, and an intuitive user interface. Built with modern technologies including React, Node.js, MongoDB, and Three.js for 3D product showcases.

portfolios.name: Interactive 3D Dashboard
portfolios.description: A data visualization dashboard featuring interactive 3D charts and real-time analytics. Built with React Three Fiber, D3.js, and WebGL for high-performance rendering.
portfolios.detailedDescription: This innovative dashboard transforms complex data into interactive 3D visualizations, making it easier for users to understand trends and patterns. The dashboard features real-time data updates, customizable charts, and immersive 3D environments. Built with cutting-edge technologies including React Three Fiber, D3.js, and WebGL for optimal performance.
challenges: Optimizing WebGL performance for large datasets
solutions: Used WebSocket for real-time data streaming
